extension.description: Plugin for adding Google Analytics to site.

field.name: googleUAID
field.label: Google ID
field.description: ID in your Google Analytics code for example: UA-1234567.

field.name: domainName
field.label: Domain Name
field.description:
If you are using subdomains with your site enter the domain name of your site.
I.E without the subdomain or www prefix.

field.name: multiTopLevel
field.label: Multiple top-level domains
field.description: Enable if your site accessed through multiple top-level domains.

field.name: javascriptPosition
field.label: Google code position
field.description: Position at either end of header or body.

field.name: ip_block_list
field.label: IP(s) Disable List
field.description: Add the IP(s) you don't want to collect analytics for to the IP(s) Disable list. Separate each IP with comma (,) or space. Regular expression 'preg' match patterns can be used (e.g. '192\..*').

field.name: php_condition
field.label: PHP Condition
field.description:
Define a PHP condition which returns 1 if plugin is to operate.
E.G. isset($_REQUEST['myvar]')

field.name: targetDomain
field.label: Target Domain
field.description: If you have a live site and a development site enter the domain of the live site here. This will allow you to copy code / database between development and live without having to publish / unpublish this plugin every time. Do not include the 'www.' prefix.
